page.title: 11TRADE
page.content: The survey covered 4 areas;Westdene ,Old Patcham and Carden Avenue.In every area we found that food and drink shops predominate except in new Patcham where there were more estate agents and other business premises. In all we surveyed 50 shops.The largest area was New Patcham with 18 shops,next was Westdene with 12 shops ,Old Patcham had 11 shops and Carden Avenue had 9. There were normally at least 2 floors but only the ground floor was used for selling others being used for accomodation or storage.The shops had an average frontage of 8 yards. Out of the 50 shops surveyed 16 of them sold food and drink,7 were business premises,6 were Newsagents and 6 were hairdressers.Others included laundrettes,take-away food shops ,hardware stores and chemists.
